Description: Four beads made of faience, three disc-shaped beads, two in turquoise, one in white faience, one of the turquoise ones is somewhat smaller. One small fragment of a cylindrical segmented bead made of turquoise faience, two segments preserved.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E4.2, north of "tower"
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
